thread.title: Ex-LSU players Clifton Garrett, Maquedius Bain visiting UAB, AL.com reports
thread.title_full: Ex-LSU players Clifton Garrett, Maquedius Bain visiting UAB, AL.com reports | NOLA.com

author: Jim Kleinpeter, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Ex-LSU players Clifton Garrett, Maquedius Bain visiting UAB, AL.com reports
text:
Former LSU players Clifton Garrett and Maquedius Bain are taking a recruiting visit to University of Alabama-Birmingham this weekend, AL.com reported .
Garrett, a five-star linebacker, left LSU in June and is currently enrolled at Arizona Western College. He played in three games for LSU and had surgery for a torn labrum in January of 2014.
Bain left the LSU program in August just before the start of fall camp and enrolled at Pearl River Community College. He was one of three players arrested in June for unauthorized entry of an inhabited dwelling. The charges were later dropped.
